short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Conveniently use iFlow while browsing web pages to improve work efficiency.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
iFlow, your AI search assistant

Residing in your browser sidebar, always ready to answer questions, summarize webpages, and spark your creativity.

🔍 Answer questions: Ask Flow when you encounter a problem, and get real-time, internet-connected responses without switching pages repeatedly.

📖 Summarize webpages: Quickly condense lengthy articles for a fast synopsis, saving your reading time.

📝 Write documents: Struggling with a document? Consult Flow for an outline and creative ideas.

👉 How to use iFlow

Click "Add to Chrome" in the top right corner and pin iFlow to your toolbar.
Log in to your iFlow account.
Activate iFlow using Command⌘/Alt + I.
📫 If you have any questions or feedback, feel free to reach out to us at service@iflow.cn.
